channel.title: PwnXile/OwnXile - 400 Plugins & 40 Quests
channel.description:
Nothing spectacular but I'm sure a few people in the community will make some use of it.
[url=http://imgur.com/a/uywH6]Screenshots[/url] [url=https://mega.nz/#!Igkx0JTZ!-58J_O_CTaVL-N3btb2QIywGYyrbvaLUqY-lOF3fzEk]Download Package[/url]
[B]Feature List[/B] OSRS bounty hunter OSRS wilderness bosses Wilderness rating award system / killstreaks Over 20 bosses, each with pets Ironman/Ultimate modes Prestige system All skills Simple quest plugin system with 40 already made Full world wide map content, full cities with dialogues Flexible shopping system with shop plugin support Dwarf multicannon Turmoil and Soulsplit Corporeal beast and Tormented Demons 6 slayer masters including a boss tasks master Fairy Ring, Karamja Cart, Gnome Glider, Sailing Wilderness Obelisk Full Castle Wars Duel Arena with Staking Fight Pits and Caves Party Room Warriors Guild Godwars Pathfinding for players and npcs Auth code system to redeem items Pin system for donator credits
More!

item.title: PwnXile/OwnXile - 400 Plugins & 40 Quests
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mks2010:

how do you run this server? like what software the client is .bat the server is just a run file

You run it like anything else?
Just because the .bat file isn’t included doesn’t mean the server is suddenly a new technology…

Either create the run.bat yourself, or use an IDE, or don’t use the server.

Read full topic

item.title: PwnXile/OwnXile - 400 Plugins & 40 Quests
item.dc:creator: @Macca187 Macca187
item.description:
@Macca187 wrote:

Nice Release But I Get This Error

Map Amount: 1226 6561 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 983 at RSInterface.addAdvancedSprite(RSInterface.java:279) at RSInterface.bountyHunter(RSInterface.java:309) at RSInterface.unpack(RSInterface.java:260) at Client.startUp(Client.java:8924) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:117) at Client.run(Client.java:5868) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Unpacking interfaces 95

on the Clients Run.bat I Fixed The Other One But Cant Figure Out How To Fix This One If You Could Help I Will Really Appreciate It And Rep You

Read full topic

Download Package

[B]Feature List[/B]
OSRS bounty hunter
OSRS wilderness bosses
Wilderness rating award system / killstreaks
Over 20 bosses, each with pets

All skills
Simple quest plugin system with 40 already made
Full world wide map content, full cities with dialogues
Flexible shopping system with shop plugin support

Turmoil and Soulsplit
Corporeal beast and Tormented Demons
6 slayer masters including a boss tasks master
Fairy Ring, Karamja Cart, Gnome Glider, Sailing

Full Castle Wars
Duel Arena with Staking
Fight Pits and Caves

Godwars
Pathfinding for players and npcs
